analysis.description:
ProofOfReadToken.publish (/unique_chucks/24/0xd75fefe3cdb647281eec3f8fc738e3bc9658f9e4.sol#59-84) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp - timeOfLastPublish < minSecondsBetweenPublishing (/unique_chucks/24/0xd75fefe3cdb647281eec3f8fc738e3bc9658f9e4.sol#67-76)
ProofOfReadToken.standard should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xd75fefe3cdb647281eec3f8fc738e3bc9658f9e4.sol#28-30)
